snippet.title: The Light in the Darkness: 15 Minutes of Gameplay
snippet.description:
Check out 15 minutes of gameplay from The Light in the Darkness, a unique game that aims to educate players about the Holocaust. Part of the way it will do that is by including survivor testimonies between scenes – showing the player real victims and hearing how their stories are similar to the game's. The Light in the Darkness will be available for Xbox, PlayStation, and PC on April 27th. It will also be displayed at the Museum of Pop Culture in Seattle in February for all visitors to play.

#IGN
